title: Frequent disconnects after ONT firmware update to 3.14.2
resolution: Rolled back ONT firmware from 3.14.2 to 3.12.9. Confirmed stability with customer.
customer_impact: Multiple customers on Fiber 200 plan with ZX-900 ONT reported link flaps after the automatic firmware push of v3.14.2.
notes: Root cause identified as a regression in the new firmware's handling of specific line conditions. Engineering team is aware and working on a hotfix (JIRA: FIB-9821). Interim solution is to roll back affected customers to v3.12.9.

title: Billing discrepancy for postpaid mobile plan
customer_impact: Customer reported double charges for international roaming in August invoice.
notes: Escalated to billing support team. Need to verify CDR logs and reverse duplicate charges if valid.

title: Low 4G speed in Sector 56, Gurgaon
customer_impact: Multiple users in the area report <1 Mbps speeds during peak hours.
notes: NOC team monitoring BTS ID 89A-45. Suspected backhaul congestion. Capacity upgrade request raised.

title: VoWiFi call drops on iPhone 14 devices
resolution: Apple released iOS 17.1 patch fixing IMS registration issue. Customers advised to update devices.
customer_impact: VoWiFi sessions dropping after 2–3 mins only on iPhone 14 series.
notes: Issue not reproducible on Android. Worked with OEM to confirm bug in iOS.

title: Customer unable to activate eSIM
resolution: Re-provisioned eSIM profile from backend. Customer successfully activated on retry.
customer_impact: Single customer reported activation failure on QR scan.
notes: Found profile corruption during initial provisioning. Fixed after deleting and reissuing.

title: Frequent spam calls reported on DND-activated number
customer_impact: Customer receiving 8–10 unsolicited calls daily despite DND enabled.
notes: Escalated to TRAI compliance desk. Need to trace originating telemarketers.

title: Fiber installation delayed beyond SLA
customer_impact: New customer waiting >10 days for Fiber 300 plan installation.
notes: Local field team facing shortage of drop cables. Expected resolution within 72 hours.

title: Recharge amount deducted but pack not activated
resolution: Recharged ₹399 pack manually and refunded duplicate deduction within 48 hours.
customer_impact: Customer unable to use data despite payment confirmation.
notes: UPI gateway showed success but backend missed callback. One-off sync issue.

title: Intermittent latency spikes on FTTH customers in Bangalore
customer_impact: High ping (>250ms) reported during online gaming hours.
notes: Preliminary analysis shows packet loss on upstream provider link. Vendor engaged.

title: Caller tunes service not getting deactivated
resolution: Manually deactivated caller tune service and reversed charges.
customer_impact: Customer charged ₹30 monthly despite SMS confirmation of deactivation.
notes: Found inconsistency in CRM record update. Engineering patch deployed.

title: 5G handset not latching onto Airtel 5G Plus
customer_impact: Customer with OnePlus 11 unable to use 5G network in Hyderabad coverage zone.
notes: Possible device whitelisting issue. OEM support ticket raised.

title: Corporate VPN drops on Airtel broadband
customer_impact: Multiple corporate users unable to maintain stable VPN tunnels.
notes: Firewall policy update suspected. Waiting for customer IT team logs.

title: Landline number not working after migration to fiber
resolution: Re-mapped SIP account to correct GPON port. Landline working.
customer_impact: Customer unable to make or receive calls post migration.
notes: Issue due to incorrect backend provisioning.

title: Recharge cashback not credited
customer_impact: Customer recharged via Airtel Thanks app but cashback not reflected.
notes: Escalated to wallet team. Waiting for reconciliation.

title: SMS delivery delay during peak hours
customer_impact: Customers report OTP SMS delays up to 10 minutes in metro areas.
notes: Traffic congestion on SMSC routes. Additional capacity planned.
